roleset.name: false

example.name: arg1
example.text: Even though the count can be checked , the worker also tells you that the verified result is incorrect . If you want the " correct " result , you must wait until you leave the hospital . What is the meaning ? Obviously ...

roleset.note: INCORRECT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'correct-j.01'. (from incorrect.01-j)
